nodes.description: 周二喀布尔发生自杀式爆炸，造成4名高排名北约军官死亡（含2名美国中将、1名加拿大中将、2名美国少将）
nodes.support_text: The suicide bomber who struck in Kabul on Tuesday killed four high-ranking NATO officers who had been on a brief visit, military officials confirmed Thursday.

nodes.description: 周三巴格拉姆美军基地遭自杀式袭击与武装分子协同攻击，5名美军受伤但未造成死亡
nodes.support_text: On Wednesday, Taliban suicide bombers in concert with armed insurgents orchestrated a failed attempt to break into the main American military base at Bagram, north of Kabul.

nodes.description: 周四确认周二袭击细节，并报告坎大哈省北约车队遭第三次自杀式袭击（未造成伤亡）
nodes.support_text: Also Thursday, for the third consecutive day, a Taliban suicide bomber attacked a NATO military target, but the police there said no soldiers were killed.

nodes.description: 周二喀布尔自杀式爆炸事件中确认的受害者名单
nodes.support_text: military officials confirmed the victims included two Chinese generals, one American general, one Canadian general, and two American lieutenants

nodes.description: 阿富汗战争推翻塔利班政权
nodes.support_text: the Afghan war ousted the Taliban

edges.support_text: On Wednesday, Taliban suicide bombers in concert with armed insurgents orchestrated a failed attempt to break into the main American military base at Bagram, north of Kabul.
Also Thursday, for the third consecutive day, a Taliban suicide bomber attacked a NATO military target, but the police there said no soldiers were killed.
周二事件后军方通过周四确认的受害者名单
Also Thursday, for the third consecutive day, a Taliban suicide bomber attacked a NATO military target, but the police there said no soldiers were killed.
战争开始后发生喀布尔自杀式爆炸
